title: Biochemistry Education Design via Interdisciplinary Approaches: Utilizing Songs and PBL

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental concepts of biochemistry and foundational understanding of pedagogy
context.additional_context: Long-term educational program combining interdisciplinary approaches and creative teaching methods (e.g., song integration) to help pre-service teachers apply biochemical concepts in elementary education settings, assuming limited technological support centered on smartphones in non-PC environments

learning_goals: Learners can creatively explain core biochemistry concepts (metabolic pathways, biomolecular structures) by connecting them to song lyrics.
Learners can design educational projects that link biochemistry principles to elementary social studies curricula (food, environment, health) using a PBL approach.
Learners can produce and evaluate biochemistry educational materials using smartphone apps and voice tools in resource-constrained technical environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
